title: Accounts collection schema
description: A schema for retrieving the accounts of the chart of accounts.

accountType.description: The type of account in the chart of accounts.

balance.description: The current balanace of the account.

draftBalance.description: The current balance of the account including draft (not yet booked) entries.

barred.description: Shows if the account is barred from being used.

blockDirectEntries.description: Determines if the account can be manually updated with entries.

contraAccount.description: The default contra account of the account.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the contra account.

self.description: The unique self link of the contra account.

debitCredit.description: Describes the default update type of the account.

vatAccount.desciption: The default VAT code for this account.

vatCode.description: The VAT code of the VAT account for this account.

self.description: The unique self link of the VAT code.

accountsSummed.description: An array of the account intervals used for calculating the total for this account.

fromAccount.description: The first account in the interval.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the first account in the interval.

self.description: The unique self link of the first account in the interval.

toAccount.description: The last account in the interval.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the last account in the interval.

self.description: The unique self link of the last account in the interval.

totalFromAccount.description: The account from which the sum total for this account is calculated.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the first account.

self.description: The unique self link of the first account.

accountingYears.description: A link to a list of accounting years for which the account is usable.

self.description: A unique reference to the account resource.
